GROUP BY -- {GROUP} `areas`.`id`, `census_staff`.`school_year_id`, `census_staff`.`staff_category_id` ) AS `main_data`
GROUP BY `main_data`.`year`, `main_data`.`area_id`, `main_data`.`classification`
